verbose_text: We have shown that one of the functional consequences of a local elevation in levels of NGF within the knee joint is a worsening of the ipsilateral weight bearing distribution (asymmetry), without any further change in pain behaviour from remote sites (ipsilateral hindpaw) in the monosodium iodoacetate (MIA) model of OA pain XREF_BIBR, implying pain phenotype specific roles of NGF.
